text: The 2020–21 FA Cup was the 140th edition of the oldest football tournament in the world, the Football Association Challenge Cup. It was sponsored by Emirates and known as the Emirates FA Cup for sponsorship purposes. The winner qualifies for the 2021–22 UEFA Europa League group stage. Premier League side Arsenal were the defending champions, but were eliminated in the fourth round by Southampton. Leicester City beat Chelsea 1–0 in the final to win their first FA Cup after being runners-up four times. ==References== Category:The Football Association Category:Football competitions in the United Kingdom Category:2020 in association football Category:2021 in association football Category:2020–21 in European football
title: 2020–21 FA Cup
